mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", su.name AS "user.name", a.contact_name AS "contactName", a.gender AS "gender", a.cell_phone AS "cellPhone", a.is_tenant AS "isTenant", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u1.login_name AS "createBy.loginName", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", u2.login_name AS "updateBy.loginName", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = a.user_id
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.contact_name AS "contactName", a.gender AS "gender", a.cell_phone AS "cellPhone", a.is_tenant AS "isTenant", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM t_customer a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.cell_phone = #{cellPhone}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_customer( id, user_id, contact_name, gender, cell_phone, is_tenant, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{contactName}, #{gender}, #{cellPhone}, #{isTenant}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_customer SET is_tenant = #{isTenant} WHERE id = #{id}
